title: Alexis Loizidis
text:
Alexis Loizidis (; born 26 June 1985) is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender.
Career.
Loizidis began playing football with Atromitos Piraeus, where he played 42 matches and scored 10 goals in the <a href="Delta%20Ethniki">Delta Ethniki</a>. In January 2005, he joined <a href="Ionikos%20F.C.">Ionikos F.C.</a> and made one substitute's appearance in the Alpha Ethniki. In August 2005, he was loaned to <a href="Keratsini%20FC">Keratsini FC</a> where he played 10 matches in <a href="Gamma%20Ethniki">Gamma Ethniki</a> and in August 2006 he was loaned to <a href="Thiva%20F.C.">Thiva F.C.</a> where he played 11 matches in <a href="Gamma%20Ethniki">Gamma Ethniki</a>.
